alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MCKINLEY COUNTY THROUGH 245 PM MDT... At 219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Brimhall Nizhoni to 9 miles southwest of Standing Rock. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Standing Rock, Brimhall Nizhoni and Coyote Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Plateau; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
